summary: This mod is more like a patch that applies the awesome SPOA Silver Knight textures created by dopalacz to the Nord Plate Bikini created by nisetanaka.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]This mod is more a patch that a real mod. It applies the textures from SPOA Silver Knight Armor to the Nord Plate Bikini armor. The armor looks like Nord Plate Bikini, of course, but it's different enough to deserve an existence of its own, more suited to a sexy paladin girl, like my Maya.

[b][color=#e69138][size=5]Installation[/size][/color][/b]
Just download and install. If you use a bodyslide version, you'll need to build the armor in bodyslide, as you did with all other armors.
If there's any problem, please don't be shy and tell me so that I'll take care of it as soon as I can.

[b][color=#ffff00][size=5]Requirements[/size][/color][/b]
To be able to use this armor, you need to install both [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32275]SPOA Silver Knight Armor[/url] and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83383]The Amazing World of Bikini Armor[/url].  SPOA Silver Knight Armor plugin (.esp) is not needed, so, if you're not interested in that amazing armor, maybe because you don't have any male character, you can disable the esp.

[b][color=#3c78d8][size=5]About the images[/size][/color][/b]
Differently than from my other mods, the images this time are not so much illustrative, that's because, to be honest, when I took them, I didn't think I'd create this mod, because creating a mod, even one as small as this, is a lot of work. Then again after a couple of days I received a little of money for my TERA Armor Enhanced Textures mod and some new enthusiastic comments, so, [size=3]since I'm weak (and stupid), [/size]I decided to give you this mod.
The images though were already done and I don't want to make new ones (yours are more than welcomed). So what you must know is that:
1) even if only a few pieces are shown in the images, all Nord Plate pieces have been created and they all look good.
2) the ritual bikini (top, bottom and circlet) is a little different now. I didn't like how these pieces looked in the images, they were too bright, so I modified them a bit.

3) with the new version, lots of things are different now. All original Nord Plate textures have been removed and the new SPOA armor is full of good looking details. Only the last image is made with the new version of the mod.

[color=#a64d79][b][size=5]Blacksmithing and Stats[/size][/b][/color]
Even if I don't use nor understand the fun in building armors (or being an alchemist), I did take the time to make this armor buildable. It has the same requisites of nisetanaka Nord Plate and it is build with the same materials, plus one or two silver ingot per piece. It also has the same stats of nisetanaka Nord Plate. I don't play the game, so I'm not interested in stats; if you think this armor should be stronger or weaker, just modify it yourself and, if you want to share your modification, you can give it to me, to upload here, or you can create your own mod, as you prefer. Don't need to ask permission for that.

[color=#ff0000][b][size=5]Credits[/size][/b][/color]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3478029]dopalacz       [/url]for the SPOA Silver Knight Armor textures
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1575830]nisetanaka    [/url]for being the GOD of ARMORS and create this sexy thing
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4087303]kofman77     [/url]for CBBE conversions and for being available and kind
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3920499]diablio           [/url]for UUNP conversion and all his other conversions. I miss you man!!! (but I totally understand that you had enough of working for us, for free)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5784126]SolidusEkan [/url]for the modified UUNP files and for starting the UV remapping on those files.[/size]
author: Arjuna76
